title:
Optimal synthesis control for evolution equations subject to nonlocal
  inputs
abstract:
We consider the linear quadratic (LQ) optimal control problem for a class of
evolution equations in infinite dimensions, in the presence of distributed and
nonlocal inputs. Following the perspective taken in our previous research work
on the LQ problem for integro-differential equations, where the memory term --
here involving the control actions -- is seen as a component of the state, we
offer a full (closed-loop, Riccati-like) solution to the optimization problem.
